title: Google\Cloud\Container\V1\AcceleratorConfig
name: AcceleratorConfig
description:
AcceleratorConfig represents a Hardware Accelerator request.

Generated from protobuf message google.container.v1.AcceleratorConfig

Extends Google\Protobuf\Internal\Message

params.name: data
params.description: Optional. Data for populating the Message object.

params.name: data.accelerator_count
params.description: The number of the accelerator cards exposed to an instance.

params.name: data.accelerator_type
params.description: The accelerator type resource name. List of supported accelerators here

params.name: data.gpu_partition_size
params.description: Size of partitions to create on the GPU. Valid values are described in the NVIDIA mig user guide.
